description: Validates data quality and integrity for ETL processes. Performs comprehensive checks including null values, data types, duplicates, ranges, and custom rules.

data.info: Data to validate. Can be a list of Data objects, single Data object, or JSON string.

validation_mode.info: Validation strictness: strict (fail on first error), tolerant (collect all errors), or report_only (no failures).

check_null_values.info: Validate for null, empty, or missing values in data fields.

check_duplicates.info: Detect duplicate records in the dataset.

check_data_types.info: Validate data types against a specified schema.

type_schema.info: JSON schema defining expected data types for each field. Supported types: string, integer, float, boolean, email, url, date.

check_ranges.info: Validate numeric values against min/max ranges.

range_schema.info: JSON schema defining min/max constraints for numeric fields.

use_custom_rules.info: Apply custom validation rules using patterns and constraints.

custom_rules.info: JSON defining custom validation rules with patterns, length constraints, etc.

include_statistics.info: Generate detailed data quality statistics in the validation report.

auto_clean.info: Automatically attempt to clean and fix data issues where possible.

null_threshold.info: Maximum allowed percentage of null values per field (0.0-1.0).

errors.no_data: No input data provided for validation.
errors.empty_data: Input data is empty or contains no records.
errors.invalid_json: Invalid JSON format in input data.
errors.no_validation_run: Validation must be run before accessing this output.
